name: juba
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of South Sudan, in the southern part of the country: He teaches fine arts at the newly reopened Juba University. Outside Juba, we saw elephants, lions, and wildebeest.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Juba the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Juba.The voting began in Juba on Sunday morning.He moved to Juba, where he trained as a teacher.The women's group has set up a small roadside tea stall in Juba.
